analysis.description: FreezableToken.toKey (/unique_chucks/27/0xa1ce63fffc453e9d7961208a163325bf5ce20ed2.sol#412-426) is declared view but contains assembly code
empty in ERC223Token.transfer (/unique_chucks/27/0xa1ce63fffc453e9d7961208a163325bf5ce20ed2.sol#673) is a local variable never initialiazed

FreezableToken.releaseOnce (/unique_chucks/27/0xa1ce63fffc453e9d7961208a163325bf5ce20ed2.sol#373-397) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(uint64(block.timestamp) > head) (/unique_chucks/27/0xa1ce63fffc453e9d7961208a163325bf5ce20ed2.sol#376-379)

FreezableToken.releaseAll (/unique_chucks/27/0xa1ce63fffc453e9d7961208a163325bf5ce20ed2.sol#403-412) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- release != 0 && block.timestamp > release (/unique_chucks/27/0xa1ce63fffc453e9d7961208a163325bf5ce20ed2.sol#405-412)

FreezableToken.freeze (/unique_chucks/27/0xa1ce63fffc453e9d7961208a163325bf5ce20ed2.sol#426-462) uses timestamp for comparisons
